CustomField.description: The unit of measure used for the mass capacity of the regulated good. For Example: ml, L, g, mg, kg, cylinder, pound, pint, quart, gallon, ounce etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The unit of measure used for the mass capacity of the regulated good. For Example: ml, L, g, mg, kg, cylinder, pound, pint, quart, gallon, ounce etc.
CustomField.label: Unit Of Measure
